description: This file contains implementation of HTTP authentication process functions, including digest and basic authentication, nonce generation, authentication info extraction, and response generation for HTTP server. It primarily handles the calculation of digest responses, creation of authentication challenges, and verification of user credentials in an HTTP server context.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpAuthoCalcDigResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNC,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri)
methods.description: Calculates the digest response based on provided parameters, including user credentials, nonces, algorithm, and entity digest.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoCalcDigestHA1(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pHA1)
methods.description: Calculates HA1 hash used in digest authentication, based on username, realm, password, nonce, and cnonce.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoCalcDigestHA2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri,PUCHAR pHA2)
methods.description: Calculates HA2 hash based on request method, URI, and entity digest, used in digest authentication.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoGetRequestHostUri(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,PUCHAR * ppHostName,PUSHORT pHostPort,PUCHAR * ppUriPath)
methods.description: Extracts the host, port, and URI path from an HTTP request object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoGetDigestAuthInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hAuthInfo,PUCHAR pDigData)
methods.description: Parses the digest authentication header to extract relevant digest info.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpAuthoGenBasicChallenge(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pRealm)
methods.description: Generates a basic authentication challenge string based on the realm.

methods.name: PUCHAR HttpAuthoGenDigestChallenge(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pDomain,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNonce,BOOL bNonceExpired)
methods.description: Generates a digest authentication challenge string with realm, nonce, algorithm, domain, qop, and stale info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoGenBasicResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hResponse,PUCHAR pRealm)
methods.description: Creates a WWW-Authenticate header with basic auth challenge and adds it to the HTTP response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoGenDigestResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hResponse,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pDomain,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNonce,BOOL bNonceExpired)
methods.description: Creates a WWW-Authenticate header with digest auth challenge and adds it to the HTTP response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoGenNonce(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PUCHAR pNonce,ULONG ulNonceLen)
methods.description: Generates a server nonce value utilizing randomness and current time.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpAuthoVerify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,ANSC_HANDLE hAuthInfo,PUCHAR pPassword,ULONG ulServerAuthType,PUCHAR pServerAuthRealm,PUCHAR pServerNonce,ULONG ulNonceTimeout,ULONG ulNonceTimestamp)
methods.description: Verifies the user's credentials against stored authentication info for both basic and digest authentication types.

ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hRequest,PUCHAR pUserName,PUCHAR pPassword,PUCHAR pRealm,PUCHAR pAlgorithm,PUCHAR pNonce,PUCHAR pCNonce,PUCHAR pQop,PUCHAR pNC,PUCHAR pEntityDigest,PUCHAR pDigestUri)
